topics.title: Adjusting Gain
topics.description: The LM386 chip has a feature that allows you to adjust its gain.
evidence_quotes: If there's nothing connected to them then the internal resistance sets the gain at 20.
However if you connect a 10 microparad capacitor between pins 1 and 8 then the gain is increased to 200.

topics.title: LM386 Audio Amplifier Kit
topics.description: A review of the LM386 audio amplifier kit, including its features and performance.
evidence_quotes: For the price it's a trusted amplifier.
